objects.name: Instructions
objects.string:
Use your left click mouse button to answer a question and the enter key to lock the answer in!
Hint: You only need to answer with one number for each question.
Good Luck!

objects.name: Finished
objects.string:
Great! You are a master at creating potions! 
Now hit your space key to go your final class!

objects.name: help1text
objects.string:
Pay attention to what each item represents! 
Understanding what each item represents is the key in order to beat the game!

objects.name: help2text
objects.string:
You will know when you get an answer correct when the number you inputted turns green! 
Don't worry if it isn't green yet! Just remember to always refer back to understanding what each item represents and try again!
